name: Hiders & Hunters
description:
Welcome to the happy world of an unsuspecting hunter, having to find 5 people in 90 seconds! Find all the people, and you will come victorious!

This game will promise to give you bucket loads of fun, as well of a hint of rage ;).

All tips & tricks are shown in the tutorial

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 August 21 - 28.
